definition: variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
Super Cup (various sports)/Super Bowl (American football championship game)

sentences.english: Ainhoa : Will you play next round of Davis Cup ?
sentences.chinese: 你回參加下輪的戴維斯盃嗎？

sentences.english: United have been drawn at home to Wolverhampton Wanderers in the third round of the Carling Cup.
sentences.chinese: 曼聯在聯賽盃第三輪的比賽裏抽中了狼隊。

sentences.english: All being well he should be available for the Carling Cup or the game before.
sentences.chinese: 他應該可以在聯賽盃前正式復出。

sentences.english: Tomasz Kuszczak, meanwhile, is expected to receive a run-out against Wolverhampton Wanderers in the Carling Cup tomorrow night.
sentences.chinese: 同時，庫什薩克也將在週三的聯賽盃上得到出場機會。

sentences.english: See the best and worst Super Bowl commercials of 2009.
sentences.chinese: 看看2009年最好和最差的超級盃廣告。

sentences.english: Edhead : Do you think Spain will beat USA in Davis Cup semifinal ?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得西班牙會在戴維斯盃四強擊敗美國嗎？

sentences.english: Super Bowl Sunday is the most-watched U.S. television broadcast of the year.
sentences.chinese: 超級盃星期天是美國一年裏電視觀衆最多的節目。

sentences.english: The winning spot kick in the 2005 FA Cup Final shoot-out against Manchester United.
sentences.chinese: 2005年足總盃決賽點球宣判了曼聯的死刑。

sentences.english: The referees and officials will act within the spirit of the event.
sentences.chinese: 裁判和工作人員的行爲應遵守創協盃的活動精神。

sentences.english: Michael Owen admitted United were under pressure prior to a comfortable Carling Cup victory over Aldershot Town.
sentences.chinese: 歐文承認在這場聯賽盃之前曼聯承受了不小的壓力。

sentences.english: The last time the sides met in the competition was at the semi-final stage in 1992.
sentences.chinese: 兩隊最近一次在聯賽盃交手是在1992年的半決賽。

sentences.english: But Murphy refuses to get carried away by the prospect of Youth Cup glory.
sentences.chinese: 但是墨菲拒絕迷醉於青年足總盃的榮譽。

sentences.english: United will face local rivals Manchester City in the semi-finals of the Carling Cup.
sentences.chinese: 曼聯將在聯賽盃半決賽裏對陣本地球隊曼城。

sentences.english: The festivities and celebrations were not painted only with the World Cup colors.
sentences.chinese: 這些慶典並不僅塗著世足盃的色彩。

sentences.english: Boat Race day, and Cup Final day, I’ve took as much as four pounds.
sentences.chinese: 賽艇日還有足總盃決賽時，我一天掙過四鎊。

sentences.english: The ground was packed out when our local team played its League Cup match.
sentences.chinese: 當我們本地的球隊爭奪聯賽盃時，場內座無虛席。

definition: to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
